allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete Charity Management System

- User authentication and role-based access control
- Dashboard with statistics and role-specific views
- Treasury and custody management system
- Expense tracking with agent and accountant views
- Social case management with file uploads
- Settings management with logo and organization info
- Personal profile management with picture upload
- Responsive modern UI with Arabic RTL support
- DataTables for data visualization
- Notification system
- Admin user hidden from users list
- Footer with masarsoft.io credit

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
